mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, PAYMENTMETHOD, PREORDER_SOURCE, ONLINEORDER_NO, BRANCH_NO, MILKMEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NO, PAYMENT_STAT, MILKBOX_STAT, INIT_AMT, CUR_AMT, DISP_LINE_NO, EMP_NO, ADRESS_NO, CREATER_NO, CREATER_BY, PREORDER_STAT, MEMO_TXT, PAY_METHOD, SOLICIT_NO, SOLICIT_DATE, SOLICITOR_NO, SOLICIT_BY,RET_REASON,RET_DATE,DELIVERY_TYPE,STOP_DATE_START,STOP_DATE_END,STOP_REASON SIGN,SALES_ORG
mapper.select: select sum(d.QTY) QTY,(select sum(INIT_AMT - CUR_AMT) from t_preorder where MILKMEMBER_NO = #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AMT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item d left join t_preorder o on d.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where o.MILKMEMBER_NO = #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DISP_DATE >= curdate() and d.DISP_DATE <= last_day(curdate()) and d.STATUS = '10'

select
FROM t_preorder WHERE MILKMEMBER_NO = #{MILKMEMBER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PREORDER_STAT = '10' and SIGN = '10'

select
FROM t_preorder WHERE MILKMEMBER_NO = #{MILKMEMBER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PREORDER_STAT = '10' and END_DATE > curdate() and (SIGN = '10' OR SIGN = '20')
select count(*) FROM t_preorder WHERE MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PREORDER_STAT = '10'

select o.ORDER_NO, o.ORDER_TYPE, o.ORDER_DATE, o.PAYMENTMETHOD, o.PREORDER_SOURCE, o.ONLINEORDER_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME BRANCH_NAME,o.BRANCH_NO, o.MILKMEMBER_NO, o.MEMBER_NO, o.PAYMENT_STAT, o.MILKBOX_STAT, o.INIT_AMT, o.CUR_AMT, o.DISP_LINE_NO, o.EMP_NO,e.EMP_NAME EMP_NAME,e.MP EMP_TEL,o.ADRESS_NO, o.CREATER_NO, o.CREATER_BY, o.PREORDER_STAT, o.MEMO_TXT, o.SOLICIT_NO, o.SOLICIT_DATE, o.SOLICITOR_NO,o.SOLICIT_BY, o.END_DATE,o.STOP_DATE_START,o.DELIVERY_TYPE, o.STOP_DATE_END,o.STOP_REASON,v.MP CUSTOMER_TEL,v.VIP_NAME MILKMEMBER_NAME,o.SIGN,o.SALES_ORG,a.ACCT_AMT,b.TEL BRANCH_TEL, o.RET_DATE,o.RET_REASON,o.ONLINE_INIT_AMT, (SELECT i.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item i WHERE i.TYPE_CODE= and i.ITEM_CODE = o.SALES_ORG ) SALES_ORG_NAME, o.DEALER_NO,o.RESUME_FLAG,e.MP EMP_TEL,o.BACK_REASON,o.BACK_DATE,o.IS_INTEGRATION,o.YGROWTH,o.YFRESH, e3.EMP_NAME PAY_MAN,p.RECEIPT_DATE PAY_DATE,p.PAYMENT_TYPE PAY_METHOD FROM t_preorder o left join t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO left join t_vip_cust_info v on v.VIP_CUST_NO = o.MILKMEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_acct a ON v.VIP_CUST_NO = a.VIP_CUST_NO left join t_md_branch_emp e on e.EMP_NO = o.EMP_NO left join t_mst_recv_bill p on p.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO and p.HAD_OFFSET = 'N' left join t_md_branch_emp e3 on e3.EMP_NO = p.RECV_EMP WHERE 1=1 and o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct o.EMP_NO, o.BRANCH_NO,'10' ORDER_TYPE from t_mst_plan_order_item e left join t_preorder o on e.order_no = o.order_no where o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' and o.PREORDER_STAT != '20' and o.EMP_NO is not null and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION select distinct o.EMP_NO, o.BRANCH_NO,'20' ORDER_TYPE from t_mst_plan_order_item e left join t_preorder o on e.order_no = o.order_no where o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' and o.PREORDER_STAT != '20' and o.EMP_NO is not null and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct o.EMP_NO, o.BRANCH_NO,'10' ORDER_TYPE from t_mst_plan_order_item e left join t_preorder o on e.order_no = o.order_no where o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' and o.PREORDER_STAT != '20' and o.EMP_NO is not null and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCATE(o.ORDER_NO,${orderNos})>0 UNION select distinct o.EMP_NO, o.BRANCH_NO,'20' ORDER_TYPE from t_mst_plan_order_item e left join t_preorder o on e.order_no = o.order_no where o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' and o.PREORDER_STAT != '20' and o.EMP_NO is not null and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCATE(o.ORDER_NO,${orderNos})>0
mapper.insert: insert into t_preorder (ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, PAYMENTMETHOD, PREORDER_SOURCE, ONLINEORDER_NO, BRANCH_NO, MILKMEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NO, PAYMENT_STAT, MILKBOX_STAT, INIT_AMT, CUR_AMT, DISP_LINE_NO, EMP_NO, ADRESS_NO, CREATER_NO, CREATER_BY, PREORDER_STAT, MEMO_TXT, PAY_METHOD, SOLICIT_NO, SOLICIT_DATE, SOLICITOR_NO, SOLICIT_BY) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preorderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{milkboxStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{curAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dispLineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solicitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solicitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{solicitorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solicitBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_preorder
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_TYPE,
ORDER_DATE,
PAYMENTMETHOD,
PREORDER_SOURCE,
ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE,
ONLINEORDER_NO,
BRANCH_NO,
MILKMEMBER_NO,
MEMBER_NO,
PAYMENT_STAT,
MILKBOX_STAT,
ONLINE_INIT_AMT,
INIT_AMT,
CUR_AMT,
DISP_LINE_NO,
EMP_NO,
ADRESS_NO,
CREATER_NO,
CREATER_BY,
PREORDER_STAT,
MEMO_TXT,
PAY_METHOD,
SOLICIT_NO,
SOLICIT_DATE,
SOLICITOR_NO,
SOLICIT_BY,
END_DATE,
SIGN,
SALES_ORG,
DELIVERY_TYPE,
DEALER_NO,
RESUME_FLAG,
IS_INTEGRATION,
YGROWTH,
YFRESH,
PAY_DATE,
IS_VALID,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preorderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{onlineSourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{onlineorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paymentStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{milkboxStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{onlineInitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{initAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{curAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dispLineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createrBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{solicitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{solicitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{solicitorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{solicitBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{isIntegration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_preorder
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PAYMENTMETHOD = #{paymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREORDER_SOURCE = #{preorderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINEORDER_NO = #{onlineorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_STAT = #{paymentStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILKBOX_STAT = #{milkboxStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_AMT = #{initAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUR_AMT = #{curAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISP_LINE_NO = #{dispLineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADRESS_NO = #{adressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_NO = #{createrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_BY = #{createrBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREORDER_STAT = #{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO_TXT = #{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOLICIT_NO = #{solicitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOLICIT_DATE = #{solicitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SOLICITOR_NO = #{solicitorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOLICIT_BY = #{solicitBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STOP_DATE_END = #{stopDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
PREORDER_STAT = #{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_AMT = #{initAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUR_AMT = #{curAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BACK_REASON = #{backReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_DATE = #{backDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MEMO_TXT = #{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder
INIT_AMT = #{initAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUR_AMT = #{curAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder
MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_DATE = #{payDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PAYMENT_STAT = #{paymentStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILKBOX_STAT = #{milkboxStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREORDER_STAT = #{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_DATE_START = #{stopDateStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_DATE_END = #{stopDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_REASON = #{stopReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_REASON = #{backReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_REASON = #{deleteReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_DATE = #{backDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO_TXT = #{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o.ORDER_NO, o.PREORDER_STAT,o.RET_REASON,o.RET_DATE, c.VIP_NAME MILKMEMBER_NO, c.VIP_NAME MEMBER_NO, c.MP CUSTOMER_TEL,b.BRANCH_NAME BRANCH_NO,b.MP BRANCH_TEL,o.ORDER_DATE,o.MEMO_TXT FROM t_preorder o left join t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO left join t_vip_cust_info c on o.MILKMEMBER_NO = c.VIP_CUST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 and o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update t_preorder
SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RET_REASON = #{retReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RET_DATE = null
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder
MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RET_REASON = #{retReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREORDER_STAT = #{preorderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder set
RET_REASON = #{retReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILKMEMBER_NO = #{milkmemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_NO = '', BRANCH_NO = '', PREORDER_STAT = '20', MEMO_TXT= #{memoTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RET_DATE = #{retDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_preorder
SOLICITOR_NO = #{solicitorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOLICIT_DATE = #{solicitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(t.FACTORY_PRICE * t.QTY) from ( SELECT i.MATNR,IFNULL(i.QTY,0) QTY, ( SELECT p.FACTORY_PRICE FROM t_ssm_sal_factory_price p WHERE 1=1 and p.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO and p.ORDER_DATE = o.ORDER_DATE and p.MATNR = i.MATNR ) FACTORY_PRICE FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO WHERE o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )t
mapper.update: UPDATE t_preorder SET FACT_AMT = #{factAmt} WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

update t_preorder set EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PREORDER_STAT != '30' and PREORDER_STAT != '40' and SIGN != '30' and ORDER_NO in
#{order}
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_preorder WHERE ORDER_NO like '${orderNo}%'

select o.ORDER_NO,e.EMP_NAME, o.END_DATE,o.INIT_AMT,o.PAYMENT_STAT,o.MILKMEMBER_NO,c.VIP_NAME MILKMEMBER_NAME ,o.PAYMENTMETHOD,o.MILKBOX_STAT,b.RECEIPT_NO FROM t_preorder o LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c on o.MILKMEMBER_NO = c.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_recv_bill b on o.ORDER_NO = b.ORDER_NO and b.HAD_OFFSET= 'N' WHERE 1=1 and o.ORDER_NO in
#{order}
SELECT IFNULL( COUNT(*),0) num FROM t_preorder o WHERE 1=1 and o.PREORDER_STAT ='10' and o.END_DATE > CURDATE() and o.MILKMEMBER_NO = #{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select o.ORDER_NO, a.MP CUSTOMER_TEL, a.RECV_NAME MILKMEMBER_NAME, b.TEL BRANCH_NO FROM t_preorder o left join t_md_address a on a.ADDRESS_ID = o.ADRESS_NO left join t_md_branch b on b.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO WHERE o.PREORDER_SOURCE != '10' and o.PREORDER_SOURCE != '50' and o.PREORDER_STAT = '10' and o.SIGN = '10' and o.PAYMENT_STAT = '10' and o.PAYMENTMETHOD = '20' and o.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}

select o.ORDER_NO, a.MP CUSTOMER_TEL, a.RECV_NAME MILKMEMBER_NAME, o.INIT_AMT, (select sum(qty) from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i where i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO and i.STATUS != '30') YGROWTH FROM t_preorder o left join t_md_address a on a.ADDRESS_ID = o.ADRESS_NO WHERE o.PREORDER_SOURCE != '10' and o.PREORDER_SOURCE != '50' and o.PREORDER_STAT = '10' and o.SIGN = '10' and o.PAYMENT_STAT = '10' and o.PAYMENTMETHOD = '10' and o.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}

select o.ORDER_NO, a.MP CUSTOMER_TEL, a.RECV_NAME MILKMEMBER_NAME FROM t_preorder o left join t_md_address a on a.ADDRESS_ID = o.ADRESS_NO WHERE o.PREORDER_STAT = '10' and (o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '10' or o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '50') and o.SIGN = '10' and o.PAYMENT_STAT = '10' and o.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}
SELECT FROM `t_preorder` t where t.BACK_DATE <= #{backDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.SIGN = '10' and t.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select o.ORDER_NO,o.EMP_NO,e.EMP_NAME FROM t_preorder o LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE LOCATE(o.ORDER_NO,${orders})>0

SELECT count(*) AS amount FROM t_preorder o WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '20' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '30' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '50' ) AND ( o.PREORDER_STAT = '10' OR o.PREORDER_STAT = '30' ) AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.PAYMENTMETHOD = 20 AND o.PAYMENT_STAT = 10 ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
